title: Discounted sale- 2 SL T206 SGC graded
author: Rachb4980

posts.post_title: Discounted sale- 2 SL T206 SGC graded
posts.post_content:
I am discounting my sale on the 2 Southern League T206 graded cards I am selling:

Foley White - Fielding - Old Mill Southern - SGC 40
Frank King - Portrait - Piedmont 350 Fact. 25 - SGC 30

Originally I was asking for $215 for the two combined. 
I am discounting it and asking for the two cards delivered through a paypal payment at:  $190

If anyone is interested...please e-mail me at [url]RachB4980@aol.com[/url]

Thanks!  Or if anyone has any other offers...feel free to throw them out there...
